events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit me properly.
The case has been identified as a refund request related to a size issue with a recent purchase.
Support agent Maria has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket purchase.
Hello! I’m Maria from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket purchase. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or damaged?
Sure, the order number is 8349201. The jacket is brand new and has not been worn at all.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a full refund once you send the jacket back using our prepaid return label.
That sounds great, I appreciate the easy return process and will send the jacket back this week.
Your return request is now registered, and we’ll process your refund as soon as we receive the jacket.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund for your returned jacket. Please let us know if anything else is needed.
Since the refund has been processed and you are satisfied, we will now close this support case. Thank you!
